short_description_localized.en: Stunning views of the Empire State Building from private terrace with Queen bed accommodations
short_description_localized.es: Stunning views of the Empire State Building from private terrace with Queen bed accommodations

description_localized.en: Look up and be amazed! The Empire Suite gives you access to your own private outdoor terrace in the heart of Manhattan and offers a reach-out-and-touch-it view of the world-famous Empire State Building. Outfitted with a Queen bed, the room features a flat screen TV, in-room safe, unlimited nationwide phone calls, coffee maker, and bath amenities. Enjoy daily continental breakfast and access to our onsite fitness and business centers. Refrigerators and outdoor furniture for the terrace may be available by request, for an additional fee. In this prime location, you’ll experience all that NYC has to offer, just steps away from your stay!

Enjoy daily continental breakfast and access to our onsite fitness and business centers. Refrigerators and outdoor furniture for the terrace may be available by request, for an additional fee.
